snippet: The shop in Windsor Terrace, Brooklyn, specializes in hearty dishes rooted in traditional Italian cooking and serves them to a 1990s beat.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Brancaccio's Food Shop in Windsor Terrace, Brooklyn, tiny storefront from which owner and cook Joe Brancaccio dishes up homestyle Italian cooking to background beat of his second passion, hip-hop.
lead_paragraph: The shop in Windsor Terrace, Brooklyn, specializes in hearty dishes rooted in traditional Italian cooking and serves them to a 1990s beat.

headline.main: At Brancaccio’s Food Shop in Brooklyn, Love of Food and Hip-Hop
